message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer is fair considering the inflation. Take it before it's too late!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'll take $65, you get $35. This is a better deal than you'll get if you wait much longer!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split.  Let's end this before we both lose out!
